Zenex 5ive provides dedicated servers in 20+ locations around the world to cusomters since 2007. We specialise in providing flexible high bandwidth servers at affordable price. Our team of engineers work 24x7 to help you run your business.

All Zenex 5ive Servers Include:

Access to our 24x7x365 technical support team
15 Minute or Less Ticket Response
Free OS Reloads
Free Migration
Streaming, File hosting, CDN, etc allowed

FREE until 20th NOV 2018*

We are offering free service until 20th of November 2018. There will be a small fee of $10 to verify the account. This will be refunded if you cancel the service before the 20th of November 2018. Servers can be deployed within 1-2 hours during business hours.

Location: Amsterdam

  • Dual Intel Xeon E5-2630v4 2.20 GHz (20 cores, 40 threads)
  • 128GB RAM
  • 4 x 1TB HDD or 2 x 240GB SSD
  • Hardware RAID
  • 1Gbps Uplink
  • 30TB Total Bandwidth
  • 1 IP
  • DDoS Protection
